attributes.action: Bring Margaret Thatcher to account for the Falklands Conflict.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Tony Blair has to account his actions for Iraq, surely Margaret Thatcher should be brought to the Law courts to explain her actions for the Falklands Conflict & explain why hundreds of British soldiers died & are still suffering from her decisions.

rejection.details: The PM can not order people before the Law Courts, however if you want to reword your petition to call more generally for a public inquiry into the Falklands conflict then we will reassess your petition.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
